content: The usual name for these lemmas is Or.inl and Or.inr. Lean 4 might have dropped the intro_left alias
Or.intro_left is new as of three months ago: https://github.com/leanprover/lean4/blame/ad10495afae46e43e5dc7e416dac1cc1426ef0f2/src/Init/Prelude.lean#L142
Yes, the examples work with version 4.0.0-nightly-2021-11-17, commit 25ebc68b875f. I guess 4.0.0-m2 is just too old for the tutorial.
Andreas Hofmeister has marked this topic as resolved.
